title: BRIEF-Blvd Centers Announces California Marijuana Treatment Initiative, Appoints New CFO

text:
40 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Blvd Centers Announces California Marijuana Treatment Initiative, Appoints New CFO Reuters Staff 
Jan 11 (Reuters) - Blvd Centers Corp: 
* BLVD CENTERS ANNOUNCES CALIFORNIA MARIJUANA TREATMENT INITIATIVE, APPOINTS NEW CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER 
* BLVD CENTERS ANNOUNCES CALIFORNIA MARIJUANA TREATMENT INITIATIVE, APPOINTS NEW CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER 
* BLVD CENTERS CORP - ‍ PABLO MENDEZ HAS BEEN APPOINTED INTERIM CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER AND VP OF ACCOUNTING​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
